page.title: 14The Fire Service
page.content: The fire service is run by the Greater London Council. The 144 fire stations in London are divided into 11 divisions. The brigade costs 115 million pounds per year. If there is a fire phone 999 it does not cost any money. The control gets in touch with your local station within 30 seconds. Our local station is in the Brighton Road. The fire brigade will be at your house within 5 minutes. When a call is received the firemen put on their fire gear as they ride in the engine. There are different appliances. They are the water tender, emergency tender, hydraulic platforms, turntable ladders etc. Firemen go to fires, road accidents and to get cats out of trees.
